message.body: Lolololololol. Well I just got back from a date with this dude I met on Valentine's Day.... And i peed my pants

Hahaha if only. So he's so boring that conversation dropped off at lunch so I just kept drinking water. Like gallons of it. Then I'm like uh I think I need to meet some friends at grand central so peace out and he's like oh I'll walk you. So we're walking through Central Park aka wasteland of no public restrooms when I'm like oh shit I have to pee. So I head toward 5th hoping to find a Starbucks, but there's only this fancy Italian restaurant so I hand the dude my umbrella and I'm like wait here. And so I run in and I'm like Do you have a restroom I can please use and the host is like take the elevator down two floors. So I'm potty dancing in the elevator when I reach the illustrious golden bathroom complete with perfume ladies and powders when I lose control of my bladder. And this old Asian perfume lady takes pity on me and gives me the next available stall and hands me a bunch of paper towels under the door
Hes gorgeous. He looks like Captain Hook from once upon a time, he carries a book of poetry with him wherever he goes. He studied medieval literature. But he actively hates film and TV.
Well I can see how that last bit is a problem
I'm having a weird little dinner date with myself at Olive Garden
I had drill today, but then I had 2 hours before a class I signed up for tonight, so I'm eating dinner by myself
It's kind of weird. I've never gone to a restaurant by myself
Hahaha, sometimes all you need is a me party though.
Haha. I'm already in uniform so it's already a possibility
I don't know that I have either... You should act like you got stood up to try and get a free meal!
Haha so I think your mom is cheating giving up facebook for lent, because Nana commented on something on facebook on her behalf
Is that allowed if she gave it up?
Now she'll have to go to the 3 hour confession event.
Someone totally paid for my dinner. I was just joking earlier
No one has ever done that before for me
